name: pullLibraries
heading: download/copy/pull the 101 libraries shared by 101 modules

inputs.*: any directory in the file system can be read if specified in list of libraries
inputs.http:*: any file from the web can be download if specified in the list of libraries
inputs.http://github.com: github project can be pulled if specified in the list of libraries

outputs.101results/libraries/*: pulled libraries used at worker time
outputs.101web/libraries/*: pulled libraries used at web time
